title: Gold Falls After Trump Backs Away From Tariffs Over Greenland
description: Gold fell after US President Donald Trump withdrew a threat to impose tariffs on European nations and said a “framework of a future deal” over Greenland had been agreed.
content: Gold fell after US President Donald Trump withdrew a threat to impose tariffs on European nations and said a “framework of a future deal” over Greenland had been agreed.
